metadata.name: coVID19 -  summarizing the results
metadata.description:
Title: coVID19 - summarizing the results

Photographer: Желимир Кръстев 
Dimensions: 6159 x 4080 Resolution: 300 ppi 
Location: Bulgaria, Pavel Banya Year: (February 3)2020

Reconstruction of the time that marked and influenced our lives in these 2 or so years. A picture was taken in February 2020. Stories about the Corona or Covid19 virus from the point of view of photographers, observers and participants in the Kuker festival.

EVERYONE HAS THE RIGHT TO THEIR OWN OPINION IN THIS PERIOD, THAT HAPPENED AND IS HAPPENING IN THE PERIOD OF THE PANDEMIC.
